name: Duster Adventures
description:
v1.0.0

Finally my second game is published. This is an amazing 3D platform with 5 levels.

Suddenly Duster got lost in another universe. Help him to escape from the island. You must complete five levels and take all boxes around the multiverse.

Instructions

WASD - move

MOUSE LEFT - spin

Please comment below if you find any bugs.
